scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --module commonjs --verbatimModuleSyntax false --moduleResolution node10 --outDir ./dist/cjs && echo >./dist/cjs/package.json '{"type":"commonjs"}'
scripts.conformance:safari:promise: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser safari
scripts.conformance:safari:callback: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser safari --useCallbackClient
scripts.conformance:chrome:promise: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser chrome
scripts.conformance:chrome:callback: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser chrome --useCallbackClient
scripts.conformance:firefox:promise: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser firefox
scripts.conformance:firefox:callback: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser firefox --useCallbackClient
scripts.conformance:node:promise: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web-node.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser node
scripts.conformance:node:callback: connectconformance --mode client --conf conformance/conformance-web-node.yaml -- tsx conformance/client.ts --browser node --useCallbackClient
